dmca.title: Copyright Owner of Adult Websites Requests Removal of Infringing Content
dmca.body:
Dear Google Team,
I have been instructed to go through this after writing to google help following many exhaustive months of trying to contact the host and whois owner of person/s heavily infringing on my copyright.
All emails have been ignored. Their whois info and domains say they live in Kharkov

1. Sites in question
sexyteens.porn-host.org
is a near direct copy of sexyteens.cyberfreehost.com (a site once 35,000/day strong, now 200/day)
including all subdirs
Compare
site:sexyteens.porn-host.org
with site:sexyteens.cyberfreehost.com

also nakedgirl.itmost.com
is a near direct copy of naked-chicks.free-sex-reviews.com

also itmost.com
is a copy of sexyteens.cyberfreehost.com

also using subdomains eg 
wetcunts.itmost.com
a copy of clip-sample-movie-trailers.com

also girls.adulthostz.com
a copy of amerture-girls-nakid-women.com
also gallaries.adulthostz.com/ladies-masterbating-lady-wanking.html 
copy of sexy-nude-grils.com/ladies-masterbating-lady-wanking.html

gallaries.adulthostz.com, wetcunts.itmost.com and girls.adulthostz.com use a mixture of stolen subdirectories from amerture-girls-nakid-women.com and big-dicks-tight-chicks.com sexy-nude-grils.com etc
All he does is change my warning

In thousands of searches this has resulted in google replacing serps with his results instead of mine.

2.
Eg Search query: naked geys
result 2 females.itmost.com/slutty-hookers-shaved-cunts.html
copy of free-nude-people-naked.com/slutty-hookers-shaved-cunts.html

result 3 girls.adulthostz.com/woman-masterbating-girl.html
copy of amerture-girls-nakid-women.com/woman-masterbating-girl.html

result 4 girls.adulthostz.com/hidden-camra.html
copy of big-dicks-tight-chicks.com/hidden-camra.html

Eg Search query: close up viginas
result 6 sexyteens.porn-host.org/close-up-clitoris-photos.html 
copy of sexyteens.cyberfreehost.com/close-up-clitoris-photos.html

result 8 www.itmost.com/modles-close-up-viginas.html
copy of sexyteens.cyberfreehost.com/modles-close-up-viginas.html

result 9 www.itmost.com/close-up-viginas-cumming.html
copy of sexyteens.cyberfreehost.com/modles-close-up-viginas.html



I have noticed the number of copied pages expanding more and more brazenly with warnings unheeded, forcing me into this course of action. I have a good belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing webpages are not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law

I swear, under penalty of perjury consistent with United States Code Title 17, Section 512, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner of naked-chicks.free-sex-reviews.com, sexyteens.cyberfreehost.com, free-nude-people-naked.com and big-dicks-tig chicks.com that are allegedly infringed.

Yours Sincerely
Thanks	
[Sender]

3. My email is [private] or [private]
4.
sexyteens.porn-host.org 63.217.29.170
wetcunts.itmost.com 63.217.29.170
nameserver NS.COLINSFREEHOST.COM 63.217.29.163

girls.adulthostz.com 63.217.29.171 NS.ITMOST.COM 63.217.29.163
